blocks.content: If you are already familiar with your logs and know the structure, you can quickly spot anomalies or errors by searching for specific keywords.
To search the logs, perform the following steps:

On the **Logs** tab, review the **Log volume** dashboard and click the log legend to filter it by log level.

For example, select the `error` log level to see all error logs or select the `info` log level to see all info logs.
To search for specific logs, type a text query in the **Filter logs by string** field.
If necessary, use the time picker located in the upper-right of the page to adjust the time range.
In the next milestone, you'll learn to use labels and fields to continue filtering your logs.
